title: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids face supernatural forces and secret government experiments.

title: The Crown
description: The story of the British royal family during the reign of Queen Elizabeth II.

title: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind plans the biggest heist in recorded history.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer.

title: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a mutated monster-hunter for hire, journeys toward his destiny.
